form-container.jcr:description: Allows the form components to be dropped into this core form container.
form-container.jcr:title: Content Form

policy_xfm.jcr:title: Workday Community Site Language Navigation - Experience Fragment

policy_651483963895698.jcr:description: - Enable lazy loading for faster page loading. - Define allowed image widths for automatic loading of the image in the most optimal resolution, given the size at which each image is displayed on the page, and the visitor's pixel density. - Disallow direct asset upload, to force authors to first upload the images to Assets.
policy_651483963895698.jcr:title: Content Image

policy_12512096045080.jcr:description: This policy defines generic styles and configurations of Image components in the Community site. This also enables the Expand Image style dropdown for authors.
policy_12512096045080.jcr:title: Community Image - Generic

policy_1683056605181.jcr:description: This policy defines default expand image configurations of Image components in the Community site. This also have option to disable the Expand Image style for the Community site, where authors can select them.
policy_1683056605181.jcr:title: Community Image - Expand

policy_641475696923109.jcr:description: Allows only H1 and disallows links for the main page title.

policy_641528232375303.jcr:description: Allows all sizes, but not H1, which is reserved for the main page title.
